title: LLS-Addon config.json
description: Configuration file for an addon for the Lua Language Server

words.description: Lua string patterns that, if matched in the content of a file, will recommend this addon get applied. These should be as unique as possible to prevent this project from being recommended too often and annoying users.

files.description: Lua string patterns that, if matched to a filename, will recommend this addon get applied. These should be as unique as possible to prevent this project from being recommended too often and annoying users.

settings.markdownDescription: Configurations to insert/overwrite in the user's local config file when this addon is applied.
